item.description:
"ADNAN SAMI LIVE IN CONCERT". Invite your friends...this is BIG!!

Visit http://www.Bostondesievents.com/ for Tix/Info. 

Starting at only: $37, $52 & VIP, VVIP 

Adnan Sami and his 12 piece Orchestra is coming to Boston with your support to put a show like no other!

* Adnan Sami is back! In 2013 with his new released Album “Press Play” which in conjunction with this WORLD and US TOUR.

* This is the only concert Adnan Sami concerts planned in the New England area Connecticut, New Hampshire, Maine and Rhode island area.

* Adnan Sami holds the record for being the fastest Piano player in the world.

*** Show Details ***

The show will start at 6pm. Doors open at 4:45pm

BU Jalwa, BU Bhangra, NU Garba will be performing at the show as well

Please note, the doors will open couple of hours earlier for shopping with various vendors and several opening acts from Best of Boston before the concert. Please check out www.BostonDesiEvents.com for details and any change in time and venue information, etc.


Tickets available at a great price right now! Tickets start at $37.
Visit http://www.BostonDesiEvents.com/ for Tix / Info & more or visit
